"Visiting Braver": "Um... Are you two from around here?"
"Nah, we're ARKS from Central City. We came here to gather some materials."
"Have you seen any other ARKS in this region? Someone that looks like this?"
"Ahh, we passed by that person just recently."
"Yeah. He had a Katana in his hand and he definitely didn't need our help."
"He went further in. He shouldn't be too far, you might still able to catch up to him."
